review_data.title: Excellent burgers and chips
review_data.content: I always have the Weiss beer which is fully flavoured. The menu has all the classics you would want from snacks through to larger main courses and desserts. I choose the burger which comes with crispy chips. Friendly staff are attentive but not intrusive.

review_data.title: Good Food and Service
review_data.content: A small Cafe with a Bar just across the reception, limited option but good food, Hamburger is delicious, service is attentive and friendly.

review_data.title: Good for a quick bite
